Detailed Description

This file contains the PRCM Reset Manager APIs implementation.

Function Documentation

static pmErrCode_t PmhalIsGlobalResetDomainIdValid ( pmhalPrcmGlobalResetGroupId_t  glbResetId)
static

This API verifies if the Global Reset Domain ID is valid or not.

Parameters
glbResetIdUnique ID of the global reset domain to be enabled
Return values
errorStatusStatus of the API call. Can be any of the following, PM_SUCCESS Indicates the operation is success PM_FAIL Indicates the reset domain is not enabled (timeout) PM_BADARGS Invalid reset domain
static pmErrCode_t PmhalIsResetDomainIdValid ( pmhalPrcmResetGroupId_t  rstId)
static

This API verifies if the Reset Domain ID is valid or not.

Parameters
rstIdUnique ID of the reset domain to be enabled
Return values
errorStatusStatus of the API call. Can be any of the following, PM_SUCCESS Indicates the operation is success PM_FAIL Indicates the reset domain is not enabled (timeout) PM_BADARGS Invalid reset domain
static pmErrCode_t PmhalIsResetDomainRegAvailable ( pmhalPrcmResetGroupId_t  rstId)
static

This API verifies if the Reset Domain ID is valid or not.

Parameters
rstIdUnique ID of the reset domain to be enabled
Return values
errorStatusStatus of the API call. Can be any of the following, PM_SUCCESS Indicates the operation is success PM_FAIL Indicates the reset domain is not enabled (timeout) PM_BADARGS Invalid reset domain
